text: Dame Anne Begg, DBE (born December 6, 1955) is a Scottish politician and the Member of Parliament for the Aberdeen South constituency in the United Kingdom. She was elected in the 1997 general election. Begg is the first permanent wheelchair user in the House of Commons. She is a member of the Labour Party. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Anne Begg
